title: Ticket #5286: condor_install for personal condor should set NETWORK_INTERFACE
description:
when condor_install is not told to set a specific role, it will set use role:personal. Then it will override the CONDOR_HOST set by the personal role to be what it determines is the full hostname. This is arguably the correct behavior when condor_install is not given any arguments, but it is the wrong behavior when it is passed the --make-personal-condor argument.

Additionally, when --make-personal-condor is passed, condor_install should set NETWORK_INTERFACE to $(CONDOR_HOST) to force the the right interface to be published by the daemon ads.
